name: The 4th Aisa-Pacific Conference on Engineering and Applied Science
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), the 4th Asia-Pacific Conference on Engineering and Applied Science (APCEAS) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of Engineering, Applied Science and more. 2017 APCEAS will take place from August 28-30, 2017 in Bali, Indonesia. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals.
